@carminebanana: Uh, this isn't new NTR from Dramus. It's from X-Eros #84, we are currently at #90 and #91 will be released next week. Not only that, this one came out before Dramus' other known series "Hitorijime" aka "First come, first served". Well, at least you found something "new" to read, so enjoy.
